aircraft.value: Skyguard MK-7 - AC-4864-859 at Base Charlie

defect_observed.value: Laser designator power fluctuation. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 23/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 26/02/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 27/02/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 05/03/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
